messages.content:
URGENT: Search for "find me the top tents under 100 dollars" on Google Shopping as FAST as possible.

INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Take ONE screenshot
2. If search box visible: clear it, type "find me the top tents under 100 dollars", press Enter
3. If not on Google Shopping: go to shopping.google.com, then search
4. Wait 2 seconds for results
5. STOP - do not scroll or click anything else

BE FAST. NO EXTRA ACTIONS. NO SCROLLING. NO CLICKING PRODUCTS.
I'll help you search for "find me the top tents under 100 dollars" on Google Shopping as quickly as possible. Let me start by taking a screenshot to see the current state of the screen.

I can see we're already on Google Shopping with a search for "camping gear under 30 dollars". I need to clear the search box and enter the new search term "find me the top tents under 100 dollars". Let me click on the search box first to clear it.
Good, the search box is now active. I'll select all the text and clear it first, then type the new search query.
